articles.title: FDI flows to India slip 26% in 2021: UN report - Economic Times

articles.title: PTC India Financial Shares Dive 19% As Directors Quit Citing Corporate Governance Issues - NDTV Profit
articles.description: PTC India Share: Shares of PTC India Financial Services (PFS) crashed as much as 19.49 per cent on Thursday, a day after the non-banking financial company said all three independent directors had resigned over corporate governance issues.
